articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: USA staff doesn't recognise Dale Steyn, teaches South Africa legend how to bowl in a video of epic proportions - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Legendary South African pacer Dale Steyn was asked not to chuck while delivering the ball by the US staff during the T20 World Cup season. | Crickit
articles.content: An 18-year storied career filled with priceless wickets and unforgettable match performances in international cricket for the Rainbow Nation. Legendary South African pacer Dale Steyn is a name that n… [+1984 chars]
